info.title: Tallyfy API - Organization - Guest - Member - Task - Activity Feed - File - Group - Template - Security - Folder - Process Instances - Process - Public Process - Step - Tag - Favorites - Form Field - Asset - Public Template - List - Public - RecurringJob - Search - SelectedTextComment - Watching - Authentication

field_type.example: text | textarea | dropdown | multiselect | radio | date | file | table
text or textarea. (Only for creating new Kick-Off field)

id.example: <Kick-Off Field ID>. (Only for existing Kick-Off fields)

tags.description: Array of tags associated to this template.

items.example: Number of values must be equal to number of columns

warning.example: For the domain tallyfy.com, we have detected 266 other organizations that have claimed this domain as their own - please contact support@tallyfy.com to resolve this issue.

description.example: Launch a process every Friday at 2pm CST

tasks.description:
Array of Tasks with the key is the ID of a Step's checklist, the value is the position and deadline of these steps. In case of missing this field, all Steps of the Process will be selected.
The deadline is the due time of a Task, if it is not specified, the default due time is 1 hour from run creation time

prerun.description: Kickoff fields data structure is dependent on type of kickoff field. There are 7 kickoff field types including date, image, checklist, dropdown, radio buttons, small text fields and large text fields.

tags.description: Array of tags associated to this template.

roles.description: roles object includes user IDs array, guest's emails array and group IDs array.

example.field: type      | folder      | members     | groups       | tag_ids    | status  | manual
example.value: procedure | <Folder Id> | [<User Id>] | [<Group Id>] | [<Tag Id>] | started | Search Text

watching.example: {object details of user, checklist, run or task}

steps.description: Array of steps to create with the template

field_type.example: text | textarea | dropdown | multiselect | radio | date | file | table

position.description: New position within the target step

post.description: Receive an authentication token and sign in the member from a third-party application or client. Contact support@tallyfy.com to register your client application/client and receive a client secret and ID. The `expires_in` property is the lifetime in seconds of the access token

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Use your email address for Tallyfy login

post.summary: Get a fresh transient token cookie for the authenticated member

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Client, requires only name and redirect
